items.sentence: Tom stayed in the bathroom for a very long time.
I don\'t think we should see each other anymore.
I don\'t think we should take that kind of risk.
I showed Tom the pictures that I took yesterday.
I suspect that Tom and Mary have both done that.
Tom actually thought Mary would go out with him.
Don\'t tell me you\'ve forgotten what day it is.
Tom doesn\'t like greasy food such as spareribs.
Tom doesn\'t like people telling him what to do.
I see that you\'ve got yourself a new boyfriend.
